docs.title: Inici
docs.text:
Aquest lloc web recull les configuracions i extensions realitzades sobre el tema Material for MkDocs utilitzades per a la creació del material didàctic dels diferents mòduls.

També recull la utilització de les diferents característiques implementades i les proporcionades pel tema original.

docs.title: Built-in admonitions
docs.text:
Nota

Alerta d'anotació note

Resum

Alerta de resum abstract

Info

Alerta d'informació info

Consell

Alerta de consell tip

Èxit

Alerta d'èxit success

Pregunta

Alerta de pregunta question

Advertència

Alerta d'avís warning

Error

Alerta de fracàs failure

Perill

Alerta de perill danger

Bug

Alerta de problema bug

Exemple

Alerta d'exemple example

Cita

Alerta de cita quote

docs.title: Admonition types
docs.text:
Títol de l'alerta

Es pot afegir un títol a l'alerta.

!!! info "Títol de l'alerta"
    Text de l'alerta.

Nota

Alerta sense títol.

!!! note ""
    Text de l'alerta.
Collapsible note

Es pot afegir un botó per a col·lapsar l'alerta.

??? note "Collapsible note"
    Text de l'alerta.
Collapsible note oberta

Es pot afegir un botó per a col·lapsar l'alerta.

???+ note "Collapsible note"
    Text de l'alerta.

Nested admonitions

Les alertes es poden imbricar.

Nested admonitions

Les alertes es poden imbricar.

!!! note "Nested admonitions"
    Les alertes es poden imbricar.

    ??? info "Nested admonitions"
        Les alertes es poden imbricar.

docs.title: Annotations in paragraphs
docs.text:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. (1) Praesent id metus diam. Aliquam condimentum libero eu tortor.

docs.title: Annotations in admonitions
docs.text:
Note (1)

This is a note. (2)

  1. Annotations can be used in admonitions titles
  2. Annotations can be used in admonitions.

docs.title: Annotations in code blocks
docs.text:
def hello():
    print("Hello, world!") # (1)!
  1. Annotations can be used in code blocks.
```python
def hello():
    print("Hello, world!") # (1)!
```

1.  Annotations can be used in code blocks.

docs.title: Python block with line highlighting and line numbers
docs.text:
def hello():
    print("Hello, world!")

Using the hl_lines attribute, you can highlight specific lines in the code block. 

```python hl_lines="2" linenums="1"
...
```

docs.title: Shell block
docs.text:
joapuiib@FP:~/git_tutorial (main) $ echo "Hello world!"
(venv) joapuiib@FP:~/git_tutorial (main) $ git diff
diff --git a/README.md b/README.md
index 6d747b3..ff524e4 100644
--- a/README.md
+++ b/README.md
@@ -1,2 +1,4 @@
 # Tutorial de Git
 Estem aprenent a utilitzar Git!
+
+Hem modificat un fitxer existent.
-Hem eliminat un fitxer.
joapuiib@FP:~/git_tutorial (main) $ git push
Total 0 (delta 0), reused 0 (delta 0), pack-reused 0
To /home/joapuiib/gitflow_example/remot
   0fb88ef..9e34bb0  develop -> develop

docs.title: Git log
docs.text:
joapuiib@FP:~/git_tutorial (main) $ git lga
* f853946 - (7 minutes ago) README: Afegits autors - Mar (origin/feature/author)
| * cc8c388 - (9 minutes ago) LICENSE: Afegida llicència - Pau (origin/feature/license)
|/  
| * 9e34bb0 - (15 minutes ago) README: Afegida descripció del projecte - Anna (HEAD -> develop, origin/develop, feature/readme, origin/feature/readme)
|/  
* 0fb88ef - (29 minutes ago) 1. Primer commit - Joan Puigcerver (origin/main, origin/HEAD, main)
[user@host ~ (main)] $ echo "Hello, world!"
(venv) [user@host ~] $ echo "Hello, world!"

docs.title: Git status
docs.text:
joapuiib@FP:~/git_tutorial (main) $ git status
On branch main

No commits yet

Untracked files:
  (use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed)
        README.md

Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
  (use "git restore <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)
        deleted:    README.md
        modified:   mkdocs.yml
        modified:   requirements.txt

Changes to be committed:
  (use "git rm --cached <file>..." to unstage)
        new file:   README.md

docs.title: Git show
docs.text:
joapuiib@FP:~/01_introduccio (main) $ git show 8e70293
commit 8e702933d5dbec9ee71100a1599ae4491085e1aa (HEAD -> main, tag: v1, origin/main, origin/HEAD)
Author: Joan Puigcerver Ibáñez <j.puigcerveribanez@edu.gva.es>
Date:   Fri Oct 13 16:06:59 2023 +0200

    Added README.md

diff --git a/README.md b/README.md
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..6d747b3
--- /dev/null
+++ b/README.md
@@ -0,0 +1,2 @@
+# 01 - Introducció a Git
+Estem aprenent a utilitzar Git!

docs.title: Git output with hints and errors
docs.text:
joapuiib@FP:~/git_tutorial (main) $ git init
hint: Using 'master' as the name for the initial branch. This default branch name
hint: is subject to change. To configure the initial branch name to use in all
hint: of your new repositoris, which will suppress this warning, call:
hint:
hint: git config --global init.dafaultBranch <name>
hint:
hint: Names commonly chosen instead of 'master' are 'main', 'trunk' and
hint: 'development'. The just-created branch can be renamed via this command:
hint:
hint: git branch -m <name>
Initialized empty Git repository in /home/joapuiib/git_tutorial/.git/
fatal: unable to auto-detect email address (got 'joapuiib@FP.(none)')

docs.text:
Ctrl+Alt+Del

++ctrl+alt+del++

docs.title: Frontmatter
docs.text:
---
template: document.html
cover:
    icon: material/file-star-outline
title: Cover
subtitle: Custom subtitle
curs: '24/25'
original_author: Carmen
license_type: Copyright
license_text: "All rights reserved © 2021"
license_image: False
cover_logo: 'img/cover/other-logo.png'
---

docs.title: Esborrany
docs.text:
Les pàgines es poden marcar com a esborranys de les següents maneres:

  • Si pertanyen al directori drafts/.
  • Si acaben en _draft.md o _unpublished.md.
  • Si comencen en _.

docs.title: Filters
docs.text:
Custom Jinja filters are provided by material-joapuiib/filters plugin.

mkdocs.yml
plugins:
  - material-joapuiib/filters

docs.title: remove_accents
docs.text:
This filter removes accents from a string.

{{ "áéíóúàèìòù" | remove_accents }}

aeiouaeiou

docs.title: Functions
docs.text:
Functions are provided by material-joapuiib/functions plugin.

mkdocs.yml
plugins:
  - material-joapuiib/functions:
      load_file:
        files_dir: files

To call a function, use the following syntax:

!function_name arg1 arg2

docs.title: Load file
docs.text:
!load_file HelloWorld.java
HelloWorld.java
public class HelloWorld {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        System.out.println("Hello, World!");
    }
}

docs.title: Programació
docs.text:
La plantilla programacio.html és una plantilla que inclou un header i un footer.

Es pot configurar la pàgina perquè utilitze aquesta plantilla afegint la següent capçalera al fitxer de la pàgina: 

---
template: programacio.html
---

docs.title: Capçalera i peus de pàgina
docs.text:
La capçalera i el peu de pàgina poden ser configurant sobreescrivint els blocks content_header i content_footer de la plantilla.

{% block content_header %}
    <p>Custom header</p>
{% endblock %}

La capçalera i el peu de pàgina es mostraran a totes les pàgines quan s'imprimisca la pàgina Ctrl+P.

docs.title: Column
docs.text:
Column layout is provided by the .columns class.

Info

Basically, it's a flexbox container with the following properties: 

.columns {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: space-around;
    align-items: center;
}


/// html | div.columns
| Column 1 | Column 2 |
|----------|----------|
| Content  | Content  |
| Content  | Content  |
| Content  | Content  |

![Placeholder](https://via.placeholder.com/150)
///
Column 1 Column 2 Content Content Content Content Content Content

docs.title: Lists
docs.text:
Info

pymodwn-fancylists extension is installed by default in this theme. It allows to create lists with numbers, letters and roman numerals, both uppercase and lowercase.

docs.text:

  3. List item number

docs.title: Magic Links
docs.text:
L'extensió Magic Links està activada, que permet convertir automàticament els enllaços en contingut de Markdown.

markdown_extensions:
  - pymdownx.magiclink

Exemple: https://facelessuser.github.io/

docs.title: Math
docs.text: KaTex està configurat a aquest tema i pot ser utilitzat de diferents maneres.

docs.title: Sinatxi inline
docs.text:
La fóruma de l'àrea del cercle és $A = \pi r^2$.

La fórmula de l'àrea del cercle és \(A = \pi r^2\).

docs.title: Sinatxi block
docs.text:
La fórmula de l'àrea del cercle és:

$$
A = \pi r^2
$$

La fórmula de l'àrea del cercle és:

\[ A = \pi r^2 \]

docs.title: Sintaxi bloc de codi
docs.text:
La fórmula de l'àrea del cercle és:

```math
A = \pi r^2
```

La fórmula de l'àrea del cercle és:

\[
A = \pi r^2
\]

docs.title: Rubric
docs.text:
/// rubric
levels:
  - Excellent
  - Good
  - Acceptable
  - Poor

criteria:
  - title: Clarity
    description: The writing is clear and easy to understand.
    score: 10 points
    levels:
      - title: The writing is excellent.
        score: 10 points
      - title: The writing is good.
        score: 7 points
        checked: true
      - title: The writing is acceptable.
        score: 3 points
      - title: The writing is poor.
        score: 0 points
///
Excellent Good Acceptable Poor Clarity The writing is clear and easy to understand. 10 points The writing is excellent. 10 points The writing is good. 7 points The writing is acceptable. 3 points The writing is poor. 0 points

$$f(a)=\frac{1}{2πi}∮_γ\frac{f(z)}{z-a}\,dz.$$ Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

docs.text:
js [1-2|3|4] let a = 1; let b = 2; let c = x => 1 + 2 + x; c(3);

--

Some stuff

docs.title: Sortable Tables
docs.text:
Use a div element with the class table-sortable to make a table sortable.

/// html | div.table-sortable
| Name | Age | Country |
|------|-----|---------|
| John | 27  | USA     |
| Jane | 23  | Canada  |
| Doe  | 45  | UK      |
///
Name Age Country John 27 USA Jane 23 Canada Doe 45 UK

docs.title: Time line
docs.text:
red pink purple deep purple indigo blue light blue cyan teal green light green lime yellow amber orange deep orange brown grey blue grey black white MarkDown 
/// html | div.timeline.dashed
### Dashed line
This is a timeline item with a dashed line.
///

/// html | div.timeline.check.light
### Checked item
This is a timeline item with a check mark.
///

/// html | div.timeline.info.dotted
### Info item with dotted line
This is a timeline item with an info color and dotted line.
///

/// html | div.timeline.error.cross
### Error and dotted item
This is a timeline item with an error and a cross mark.
///

/// html | div.timeline.success
### Success item
This is a timeline item with a success color.
///

docs.title: Dashed line
docs.text: This is a timeline item with a dashed line.

docs.title: Checked item
docs.text: This is a timeline item with a check mark.

docs.title: Info item with dotted line
docs.text: This is a timeline item with an info color and dotted line.

docs.title: Error and dotted item
docs.text: This is a timeline item with an error and a cross mark.

docs.title: Success item
docs.text: This is a timeline item with a success color.

docs.title: Zoom images
docs.text:
MkDocs GLightBox plugin is provided in this theme to support zoom images.

Yuhan Chang

Figura 1. Kenting, Taiwan

docs.title: Built-in icons
docs.text: A complete list can be found at https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/reference/icons-emojis/#search

docs.title: Page icons
docs.text:
In the frontmatter: 

---
icon: material/book-open-variant
---

docs.title: Section icons
docs.text:
Section icons are set as a prefix to the section title in the table of contents. This also works for external links.

.pages
nav:
    - ...
    - ":material/pencil-outline: Icon section": icons
